title: 81. Talking cell phone addiction
description:
In this week's episode I am talking about cell phone addiction and some steps I'm taking in 2021 to combat it. 

MY BLOG COURSE Learn how our family supports ourselves full-time on our homestead with our blog and Youtube channel with my blogging course. Join over 1000 students in learning how to grow your own blog from scratch in my proven program:   https://create-your-blog-dream.teachable.com/p/create-your-blog-dream-and-video-for-bloggers-u
